MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A man who works in business, especially one who owns, manages, or directs a commercial or industrial enterprise.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 从事商业活动的男子，尤指经营、管理或拥有商业或工业企业的人。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He started his career as a local merchant but quickly grew into a powerful international businessman.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他以本地商人的身份开始了他的职业生涯，但很快就发展成为一名强大的国际商人。
